data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Kouffo, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kouffo, Benin
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Kouffo, Benin.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Kouffo, Benin a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Kouffo an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Watchi people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Kouffo to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 135,005 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kouffo, Benin has a population of 560,200.

We estimate Kouffo has 41,842 people who might know Jesus, 135,005 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 383,353 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Kouffo
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

location.name: Kouffo
